item.title: Shadowsocks的安装与配置
item.description: 环境准备 OS: CentOS 7.6 安装Shadowsocks 连接服务器,安装Shadowsocks # 安装pip yum install python-setuptools easy_install pip # 安装shadowsocks pip install shadowsocks 配置服
